812 1,382 587 268 1,223 2,078 1,055 370 2,035 3,460 Mar 452 126 985 1,563 576 203 1,403 2,182 1,028 329 2,388 3,745 Apr 525 187 1,303 2,015 688 332 1,793 2,813 1,213 519 3,096 4,828 May 540 174 1,034 1,748 795 Jun 908 379 943 2,230 835 Jul 642 228 920 1,790 738 Aug 606 225 925 1,756 536 290 1,283 2,368 401 1,077 2,313 1,743 296 1,013 2,047 1,380 284 1,034 1,854 1,335 464 2,317 4,116 780 2,020 4,543 524 1,933 1,933 3,837 1,142 509 1,959 3,610 Sep 525 250 1,080 1,855 556 303 1,074 1,933 1,081 553 2,154 3,788 Oct 286 102 535 923 293 162 639 1,094 579 264 1,174 2,017 Nov 410 114 760 1,284 385 206 850 1,441 795 320 1,610 2,725 Dec Total 1944 365 150 810 1,325 6,056 2,109 10,629 18,794 333 224 788 1,345 698 374 1,598 1,598 2,670 6,789 3,158 12,852 22,799 12,845 5,267 23,481 41,593 1945 Jan 263 167 457 887 270 234 541 1,045 533 401 998 1,932 Feb 180 104 646 930 197 155 731 1,083 377 259 1,377 2,013 Mar 429 256 811 1,496 331 224 892 1,447 760 480 1,703 2,943 Apr 201 75 547 823 161 127 655 943 362 202 1,202 1,766 May 2 3 10 15 3 1 10 14 5 4 20 29 Jun 3 3 1 1 4 4 Jul Aug Total 1945 1,078 605 2,471 2,471 4,154 963 Date unknown 18 Grand Total 9,125 3,236 24 741 2,829 4,533 2,041 1,346 5,300 8,687 209 251 25 36 255 316 60 464 567 15,829 28,190 10,751 5,177 19,292 35,220 19,876 8,413 35,121 63,410 43 *Wounded and evacuated. *Missing, interned, and captured.   ## p. 612 (#636) ############################################    ## p. 613 (#637) ############################################  Appendix 6 Total Battle Casualties in Mediterranean Theater of Operations December 1941 to August 1945 Officers Enlisted Personnel Total Personnel Died Wounded* Missing* Total Died Wounded* Missing* Total Died Wounded* Missing* Total 1941 Dec 1 · 1 1942 Jan 7 4 11 1 Feb 2 3 5 10 1 95 9 5 1 10 8 13 6 3 8 5 26 1 21 16 Mar Apr May Jun 125 115 2 1 1 1 2 12 5 3 3 74 828 4 8 Jul 13 13 13 14 26 • 27 Aug 6 Sep 5 Oct 11 5 Nov Dec Total 1942 1943 Jan Feb Mar 383 275 28 60 92 45 67 33 Apr 126 May 94 10 w ka u
